com.viaoa.object

Class OAObjectHashDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.object.OAObjectHashDelegate

  • public class OAObjectHashDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    List of Hashtables used by Delegates, some of which need to have OAObject rehashed when the ObjectKey is changed.
    Author:
    vincevia

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Class,java.lang.Object> hashCacheClass
      Used by Cache to store all OAObjects.
      protected static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap hashCacheListener
      List of listeners for Cached objects Key = Class Value = Vector of listeners
      protected static java.util.Hashtable hashCacheNamedHub
      Used by Cache to store a Hub using a name.
      protected static java.util.Hashtable hashCacheSelectAllHub
      Used by Cache to store all hubs that have selected all objects.
      protected static java.util.Hashtable<OALinkInfo,java.util.ArrayList> hashLinkInfoCacheArrayList 
      protected static java.util.Hashtable<OALinkInfo,java.util.HashSet> hashLinkInfoCacheHashSet 
      protected static java.util.Hashtable<OALinkInfo,java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock> hashLinkInfoCacheLock
      Used by OALinkInfo to cache Hubs so that they are not strong linked within object.
      protected static java.util.Hashtable hashLock
      Locking support for OAObject.
      protected static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Class,OAObjectInfo> hashObjectInfo
      Static cache of OAObjectInfo, keyed on Class.
      protected static java.util.Hashtable<OAObjectInfo,Hub> hashRootHub
      Used by OAObjectInfoDelegate to store the Root Hub for recursive classes.
      protected static java.util.ArrayList lstRehash

      • hashLinkInfoCacheLock

        protected static final java.util.Hashtable<OALinkInfo,java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock> hashLinkInfoCacheLock
        Used by OALinkInfo to cache Hubs so that they are not strong linked within object. Key = OALinkInfo

      • hashRootHub

        protected static final java.util.Hashtable<OAObjectInfo,Hub> hashRootHub
        Used by OAObjectInfoDelegate to store the Root Hub for recursive classes. Key = Class Value = Hub (that is the 'top' (root) Hub of a recursive hub)

      • hashObjectInfo

        protected static final java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Class,OAObjectInfo> hashObjectInfo
        Static cache of OAObjectInfo, keyed on Class. Key = Class Value = OAObjectINfo

      • hashLock

        protected static final java.util.Hashtable hashLock
        Locking support for OAObject. See OALock Key = OAObject Value = OALock

      • hashCacheClass

        protected static final java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Class,java.lang.Object> hashCacheClass
        Used by Cache to store all OAObjects. Key = Class Value = TreeMap with all of the OAObjects in it.

      • hashCacheListener

        protected static final java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap hashCacheListener
        List of listeners for Cached objects Key = Class Value = Vector of listeners

      • hashCacheSelectAllHub

        protected static final java.util.Hashtable hashCacheSelectAllHub
        Used by Cache to store all hubs that have selected all objects. Key = Class Value = WeakRef of Hubs

      • hashCacheNamedHub

        protected static final java.util.Hashtable hashCacheNamedHub
        Used by Cache to store a Hub using a name. Key = upperCase(Name) Value = Hub

        protected static java.util.ArrayList lstRehash
